definition: to pass the winter/to overwinter/to live through the winter
generic word for peoples or states of south China or south Asia at different historical periods/abbr. for Vietnam 越南
to exceed/to climb over/to surpass/the more... the more
winter

sentences.english: Its mature larva makes cocoon under the earth during the winter.
sentences.chinese: 以老熟幼蟲在土中結繭越冬。

sentences.english: Both are designated primarily for migrating and wintering birds.
sentences.chinese: 它們都主要是過路和越冬鳥類的棲息地。

sentences.english: The SW have strong ability on cold tolerance.
sentences.chinese: 越冬品系具有很強的耐低溫能力。

sentences.english: In this condition the overwintering larva survived with very high percentage and became the first source in coming year.
sentences.chinese: 在這種情況下越冬幼蟲存活率高，成爲下一年的蟲源。

sentences.english: It over-wintered with the pupa in fallen leaves or the weeds of ground.
sentences.chinese: 以蛹在向陽地的殘株落葉或雜草中越冬。

sentences.english: Were parasitized larvae overwinter in the frozen soil layer below, known as winter worm.
sentences.chinese: 被寄生的幼蟲在凍土層以下越冬，稱爲冬蟲。

sentences.english: Pomegranate must be covered with soil to overwinter safely in Xingjiang.
sentences.chinese: 新疆冬季寒冷，石榴必須埋土才能安全越冬。

sentences.english: The distribution patterns of diseased plants seriousness in overwintering period and flowering stage were of aggregation distribution.
sentences.chinese: 病級分佈在越冬期和盛花期均爲聚集分佈。

sentences.english: So the wintering period of Hooded Crane at Chongming Dongtan is about 5 months.
sentences.chinese: 因此，白頭鶴在崇明東灘的越冬期約爲5個月。

sentences.english: Large quantity of pathogen of the autumn seedlings will increase the pathogen quantity in over-wintering seedlings.
sentences.chinese: 小麥秋苗帶菌量大，則翌春病菌越冬菌源量也大。

sentences.english: Plow and irrigate in winter after harvest.
sentences.chinese: 玉米收穫後耕翻冬灌，消滅越冬蟎體。

sentences.english: The weather is favourable to the winter crops.
The negative accumulated temperature decreased obviously during the over-wintering period.
sentences.chinese: 冬小麥越冬期負積溫明顯減少。

sentences.english: About 70 Chinese mergansers choose to spend winter here.
sentences.chinese: 約有70只中華秋沙鴨選擇在這裏越冬。

sentences.english: Only love a little thicker storage, winter will not be frozen.
sentences.chinese: 只有把愛儲得厚一點，越冬時纔不會感到冰冷。

sentences.english: To remove the source of the insect in storage stage was a very effective method.
sentences.chinese: 在貯存期消滅越冬蟲源是防治該蟲最有效的方法。

definition: to migrate (of birds)
migratory bird
(bird species of China) whooper swan (Cygnus cygnus)
to get through the winter
nonmigratory bird
(bird species of China) oriental stork (Ciconia boyciana)
to lay eggs
to breed/to reproduce/to propagate
(bird species of China) black-headed gull (Chroicocephalus ridibundus)
(bird species of China) common crane (Grus grus)
plant diseases and insect pests
injurious insect/pest
habitat
(bird species of China) black-necked crane (Grus nigricollis)
(of a bird) to perch/(of creatures in general) to inhabit/to dwell
(bird species of China) bar-headed goose (Anser indicus)
